ICFJ Impact

Cargografías

Create visualizations comparing candidates' job experience for elected and non-elected positions.

Developers Andres Snitcofsky
Fellows Mariano Blejman
Stories "Cargografías informs voters
journalists with data visualization of politicians' careers"
Github https://github.com/cargografias
Cost Free

Data visualization platform Cargografías allows voters to trace the path of candidates running for public office – from their first political move to their most recent. Cargografías structures this information on a timeline that lets users see, at a glance, the elected and non-elected positions held by various political leaders, divided by executive or legislative functions. The platform features different filters, letting you view information by the public officer's region of influence, the positions held or length of term.

The database powering the system includes more than 2,400 Argentine politicians and 4,500 public positions held.

For more: http://bit.ly/1USvrt0
